note.p: Daughter of Emma Martha Shuttleworth and Philip Nicholas Shuttleworth (warden of New College, Oxford, and bishop of Chichester); sister of the translator and poet Frances Bevan.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/788/126/14)
ODNB s.v. Shuttleworth, Philip Nicholas, and Bevan, Frances
